title: Quantifying Amorphous Structures on the nm Scale: LiNbO3 Coatings in Solid State Batteries
content: To prevent unwanted reactions between the electrolyte and the cathode active material (CAM) in e.g. solid-state batteries (SSB), a protective coating on the CAM is applied [1]. Desired properties of such coatings are high ionic conductivity and good chemical resistance [1]. LiNbO3 is a suitable material candidate with these properties, which was already successfully applied for SSBs [2].
